com.client.core.base.service.transaction

Interface TransactionService<T extends JpaEntity<PK>,PK>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the entity with which we will be interacting with the database
    PK - the id of the entity with which we will be interacting with the database
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardTransactionService

    public interface TransactionService<T extends JpaEntity<PK>,PK>
    Service used to wrap DAO calls with transaction-specific code so as to remove that dependency on code interacting with a database. This object can be directly interacted with without any regards to handling a database transaction or seswsion.

throws javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException

        Parameters:
        id - the primary key of the entity
        Returns:
        the entity of type T
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - when no entity with primary key PK exists

        Gets a List of all entities in table
        Returns:
        a List. If no entities exists an empty List will be returned.

     throws javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException
        Deletes entity T from table.
        Parameters:
        persistentObject - Entity to delete
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if the instance is not an entity or is a detached entity

      • query

        java.util.List<T> query(java.lang.String queryString,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> queryParameters)
        Queries the current table using the passed in where clause
        Parameters:
        queryString - a query string
        queryParameters - parameters to inject into the queryString
        Returns:
        a List of all entities filtered by the passed query

      • batchUpdate

        java.util.List<T> batchUpdate(java.util.List<T> transientObjects)
        Updates all entities passed in and returns a list of the updated objects
        Parameters:
        transientObjects - List of objects to update
        Returns:
        a List of all updated entities
